nodes.text: The Jedi shuttlebus, also known as the Jedi shuttle or Senate shuttlebus or Senate speeder bus, was a model of airbus used on Coruscant during the final years of the Galactic Republic by members of the Galactic Senate and the Jedi Order.
The shuttlebus was eighteen meters long and was similar in appearance to the Magnaline 3000 airbus, used as a public transport vessel in Galactic City.
Following the Battle of Coruscant, Supreme Chancellor Palpatine was escorted back to the Republic Executive Building by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker in a Jedi shuttlebus.

Kenobi then traveled to the Jedi Temple to report to the Jedi High Council. Several other shuttlebuses were docked at the Executive Building at that time, presumably used by Senators and Republic officials.
